Uses of Package
org.transitime.core

  • Packages that use org.transitime.core 
    Package Description
    org.transitime.applications  
    org.transitime.core
    Contains the core classes that process the AVL data and create predictions, arrival/departure times, headway, etc.
    org.transitime.core.clientDataManagers
    Contains server-side managers that keep track of real-time data such that it can be made available to clients via RMI.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.applications 
    Class and Description
    Service
    For working with service types, such as determining serviceId or appropriate block to use for a given epoch time.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.core 
    Class and Description
    ArrivalsDeparturesProcessor 
    BlockAssigner 
    BlockAssignmentMethod 
    DataProcessor
    Takes the AVL data and processes it.
    HeadwayProcessor 
    MatchProcessor
    For generating predictions, arrival/departure times, headways etc.
    PredictionsProcessor 
    SpatialMatch 
    TemporalDifference
    For keeping track of how far off a vehicle is from the expected time.
    TemporalMatch 
    TemporalMatcher 
    TravelTimes 
    VehicleAtStopInfo
    So that VehicleState can keep track of whether vehicle is matched to a stop.
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
    VehicleStateManager
    For keeping track of vehicle state.
  • Classes in org.transitime.core used by org.transitime.core.clientDataManagers 
    Class and Description
    VehicleState
    Keeps track of vehicle state including its block assignment, where it last matched to its assignment, and AVL reports.
